Package com.example.syntaxeventlottery

Class UserRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.syntaxeventlottery.UserRepository
public class UserRepository extends Object
Repository class for managing user-related data operations, including Firebase Firestore and Firebase Storage integration.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    UserRepository()
    Initializes the UserRepository with Firestore and Firebase Storage references.

    • getLocalUsersList

      public ArrayList<User> getLocalUsersList()
      Retrieves the cached list of users.
      Returns:
      A copy of the local users list.

    • fetchAllUsers

      public void fetchAllUsers(DataCallback<Void> callback)
      Fetches all users from Firestore and updates the local cache.
      Parameters:
      callback - Callback to handle the success or failure of the operation.

    • addUserToRepo

      public void addUserToRepo(User user, @Nullable android.net.Uri imageUri, DataCallback<User> callback)
      Adds a new user to Firestore and uploads their profile photo if provided.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be added.
      imageUri - The URI of the user's profile photo (optional).
      callback - Callback to handle the success or failure of the operation.

    • deleteUserfromRepo

      public void deleteUserfromRepo(User user, DataCallback<Void> callback)
      Deletes a user from Firestore and removes them from the local cache.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be deleted.
      callback - Callback to handle the success or failure of the operation.

    • uploadProfilePhoto

      public void uploadProfilePhoto(User user, HashMap<String,Object> data, android.net.Uri imageUri, DataCallback<User> callback)
      Uploads a user's profile photo to Firebase Storage and updates Firestore with the photo URL.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose photo is being uploaded.
      data - The user's data to be updated in Firestore.
      imageUri - The URI of the profile photo.
      callback - Callback to handle the success or failure of the operation.

    • updateUserDetails

      public void updateUserDetails(User user, @Nullable android.net.Uri imageUri, DataCallback<User> callback)
      Updates the details of an existing user in Firestore and uploads their profile photo if provided.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be updated.
      imageUri - The URI of the new profile photo (optional).
      callback - Callback to handle the success or failure of the operation.

    • uploadDefaultPhoto

      public void uploadDefaultPhoto(User user, HashMap<String,Object> data, DataCallback<User> callback)
      Uploads a default profile photo for the user based on their username.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to receive the default profile photo.
      data - The user's data to be updated in Firestore.
      callback - Callback to handle the success or failure of the operation.

    • updateLocation

      public void updateLocation(User user, ArrayList<Double> location, DataCallback<User> callback)
      Updates the user's location data in Firestore.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose location needs to be updated.
      location - The new location data to be stored (e.g., [latitude, longitude]).
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure.

    • userToHashData

      public HashMap<String,Object> userToHashData(User user)
      Converts a User object to a HashMap for Firestore storage.
      Parameters:
      user - The user to be converted.
      Returns:
      A HashMap representation of the user.
